thread.title: Warriors’ Festus Ezeli takes his shot-blocking role seriously
thread.title_full: Warriors’ Festus Ezeli takes his shot-blocking role seriously - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Scott Ostler
title: Warriors’ Festus Ezeli takes his shot-blocking role seriously
text:
Photo: Scott Strazzante, The Chronicle Golden State Warriors' Festus Ezeli against Toronto Raptors during Warriors' 95-87 win in NBA preseason game at SAP Center in San Jose, Calif., on Monday, October 5, 2015. Golden State Warriors' Festus Ezeli against Toronto Raptors during...
When the Warriors’ offense is working, it’s like a flowing river. Flow and rhythm are the two words most often used by interim coach Luke Walton when talking about the offense. Golden State Warriors' Festus Ezeli against Toronto Raptors during Warriors' 95-87 win in NBA preseason game at SAP Center in San Jose, Calif., on Monday, October 5, 2015. Golden State Warriors' Festus Ezeli against Toronto Raptors during...
When the Warriors’ offense is working, it’s like a flowing river. Flow and rhythm are the two words most often used by interim coach Luke Walton when talking about the offense.
